help-file.title: CORPSEFORM
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <corpse> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Enchantment
With a player corpse at their feet, "Corpseform" will transform the appearance of the Necromancer into that of the corpse, temporarily disguising him/her. This effect will last until the disguise is broken by a spell, damage or the duration runs out.
